name: Transferrer
description: Transferrer, handles Tangle transfers. Contains the transfer and transferFrom functions for Tangle.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfers Tangle from one holder to another, may implement a variable number of taxes and may modify the amount transferred. Modifies the value transferred according to the pre and tax Transformers (external implementations).

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address Tangle will be sent to.

returnDecorators.description: Whether or not the transfer was successful.

functionDecorators.name: transferFrom
functionDecorators.description: Transfers Tangle from one holder to another, may implement a variable number of taxes and may modify the amount transferred. Can be initiated by an approved 3rd party. Modifies the value transferred according to the pre and tax Transformers, which are implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The address Tangle will be sent from.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address Tangle will be sent to.

returnDecorators.description: Whether or not the transfer was successful.
